original_solution_mapping.L1: It takes 10 minutes to dry the coat of a short-haired dog and twice as long for a full haired dog so they take 10*2 = <<10*2=20>>20 minutes to dry
original_solution_mapping.L2: He had 6 short hair dogs and they took 10 minutes to dry each so they took 6*10= <<6*10=60>>60 minutes to dry
original_solution_mapping.L3: He had 9 full haired dogs that took 20 minutes to dry each so they took 9*20 = <<9*20=180>>180 minutes to dry
original_solution_mapping.L4: Together is takes him 60+180 = <<60+180=240>>240 minutes to dry all of the dogs
original_solution_mapping.L5: 60 minutes are in 1 hour and he spends 240 minutes on the dogs so he worked for 240/60 = <<240/60=4>>4 hours drying the dogs

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2318.
    Returns: the total hours to dry all of the dogs.
    """
    # L1
    short_hair_dry_time_minutes = 10 # 10 minutes to dry a short-haired dog
    full_hair_multiplier = 2 # twice as long
    full_hair_dry_time_minutes = short_hair_dry_time_minutes * full_hair_multiplier

    # L2
    num_short_hair_dogs = 6 # 6 short-haired dogs
    total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes = num_short_hair_dogs * short_hair_dry_time_minutes

    # L3
    num_full_hair_dogs = 9 # 9 full-haired dogs
    total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes = num_full_hair_dogs * full_hair_dry_time_minutes

    # L4
    total_dry_time_minutes = total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes + total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes

    # L5
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    hours_in_one_hour = 1 # WK
    total_dry_time_hours = total_dry_time_minutes / minutes_per_hour

    # FA
    answer = total_dry_time_hours
    return answer

He had {num_short_hair_dogs} short hair dogs and they took {short_hair_dry_time_minutes} minutes to dry each so they took {num_short_hair_dogs}*{short_hair_dry_time_minutes}= <<{num_short_hair_dogs}*{short_hair_dry_time_minutes}={total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes}>>{total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes} minutes to dry

He had {num_full_hair_dogs} full haired dogs that took {full_hair_dry_time_minutes} minutes to dry each so they took {num_full_hair_dogs}*{full_hair_dry_time_minutes} = <<{num_full_hair_dogs}*{full_hair_dry_time_minutes}={total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes}>>{total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes} minutes to dry

Together is takes him {total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes}+{total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes} = <<{total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes}+{total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes}={total_dry_time_minutes}>>{total_dry_time_minutes} minutes to dry all of the dogs

{minutes_per_hour} minutes are in {hours_in_one_hour} hour and he spends {total_dry_time_minutes} minutes on the dogs so he worked for {total_dry_time_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_dry_time_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_dry_time_hours}>>{total_dry_time_hours} hours drying the dogs

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He had 6 short hair dogs and they took 10 minutes to dry each so they took 6*10= <<6*10=60>>60 minutes to dry

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_full_hair_dry_time_minutes' (value: 180) was used instead of 'total_short_hair_dry_time_minutes' (value: 60).
